entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 MigrateAsync() not working anymore #29786
  • AutoTransactionBehavior change breaks under AWS RDS Aurora MySql Proxy -- throws DbUpdateConcurrencyException #29785
  • EF Core 7 - FirstWithoutOrderByAndFilterWarning in simple query with multiple aggregate functions #29782

Closed

  • SQLite RevEng: Use .NET types #29614
  • Remove parentheses by allowing providers to specify SQL operator precedence and associativity #27253
  • Expression query not computed anymore from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET Core 6 #29736
  • ChangeTracker not behaving as expected for nested objects. #29765
  • SQL Server - Table-Per-Hierarchy (TPH) - Creates multiple FKs to the same table #29770

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix making column required on SQL Server with idempotent migrations #29784
  • Updating SQLitePCLRaw library versions to 2.1.3 as it has ppc64le sup… #29783
  • SQLite: Simplify !Regex.IsMatch to NOT REGEXP #29781

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix missing HasForeignKey when principal key is an alternate key #29731
  • [release/7.0] Fix SQL Server bulk insert edge case (#29669) #29717
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix bug where a non-sproc command comes before a sproc command #29722
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Support entities with owned types in ExecuteUpdate setter property lambda #29723
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Use correct parameter in query based on type mapping #29724
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Allow shared columns with nullable value converters #29778
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
